caption: In this episode, the protagonist receives an email, deciding to deliver a speech about family at the wedding of John and Mary. However, he finds himself perplexed when asked to be the best man. At the wedding, the protagonist accidentally discovers a vital clue, beginning to doubt whether the marriage of John and Mary is genuine. Key points include: an email leads the protagonist to doubt John and Mary's marriage; the protagonist decides to give a speech about family at the wedding; he feels lost when asked to be the best man; the protagonist finds an important clue; he starts to question the authenticity of the marriage; the protagonist visits Helen Louise; he thinks the best man is Billy Kincaid; bridegroom and bride's wedding goes smoothly; the protagonist gives a speech at the wedding, praising bridegroom; the protagonist bids farewell to bridegroom, wishing him happiness.
